start: Hello! I am a bot for rolling dice in D&D and other systems. Use the command /roll or /roll XdY(+Z) to roll the dice. For example, /roll 2d20+5. You can also use multiple dice: /roll 2d6+1d8+3.
help: Use the command /roll XdY(+Z) to roll the dice. For example, /roll 2d20+5. By default, a single d20 die is rolled. You can also use multiple dice: /roll 2d6+1d8+3.
invalid_format: Invalid command format. Use /roll XdY(+Z), where X and Y are numbers, and Z is a modifier.
error: An error occurred while processing your command. Please try again.
